version.description: Schema version string (not the content version), following the SchemaVer format as described at http://snowplowanalytics.com/blog/2014/05/13/introducing-schemaver-for-semantic-versioning-of-schemas/

id.description: The unique identifier consistent witht he requirements in 'WHO-IUIS Nomenclature Subcommittee for immunoglobulins and T cell receptors report', PMID: 18036660, 18046549

species.description: Binomial species name as determined by International Code of Nomenclature for algae, fungi, and plants (ICN), e.g. `homo sapien`, `mus musculus`

germline-evidence.description: Numerical measure of germline sequencing evidence for this sequence.

expression-evidence.description: Numerical measure of expression evidence for this sequence.

studies-evidence.description: Overall measure of studies providing evidence for this germline sequence.

sequence.description: Nucleotide sequence, without gaps.  This is a raw sequence, not an alignment.

created.description: Date this record was created.  This value is not modified after creation.

updated.description: Date this record was last updated.

cyst_position.description: zero-based nucleotide position along the sequence of signal Cysteain residue.

tryp_position.description: zero-based nucleotide position along the sequence of signal Tryptophan residue.

phen_position.description: zero-based nucleotide position along the sequence of signal Phenylalanine residue.
